contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|shelter|shelters}} {{Commons category|Shelters}} '''Shelter''' may refer to: * [[Shelter (building)]], a basic architectural structure or building that provides cover. * [[Homeless shelter]], a temporary residence for [[homeless]] people, sometimes simply referred to as a 'shelter' == Organisation == * [[Shelter (charity)]], a [[United Kingdom|UK]]-based charitable organisation that assists people impacted by [[homelessness]] == Transportation == * [[Shelter (automobile)]], a Dutch experimental city car of the 1950s * a [[wikt:container|container]] used for protecting people or property, usually on the back of a vehicle. == Places == * [[Port Shelter]], Hong Kong * [[Shelter Bay (disambiguation)]], various locations * [[Shelter Cove (disambiguation)]], various locations * [[Shelter Island (disambiguation)]], various locations * [[Shelter Point]], South Georgia Island ==Film and television== * [[The Shelter (The Twilight Zone)|"The Shelter" (''The Twilight Zone'')]], an episode of the television series * [[Shelter (1998 film)|''Shelter'' (1998 film)]], a 1998 film starring [[John Allen Nelson]] * [[Shelter (2007 film)|''Shelter'' (2007 film)]], a 2007 film by Jonah Markowitz starring Trevor Wright * [[Shelter (2010 film)|''Shelter'' (2010 film)]], a 2010 film codirected by Måns Mårlind and Björn Stein starring Julianne Moore * [[Shelter (2012 film)|''Shelter'' (2012 film)]], a 2012 film directed by Adam Caudill and Wrion Bowling ==Literature== * ''Shelter'', a novel by [[Marguerite Steen]] published by The Viking Press in 1941 * ''Shelter'', a novel by [[Chaz Brenchley]] published by Hodder & Stoughton in 1999 * ''Shelter'', a novel by [[Susan Palwick]] published by Tor in 2007 * ''Shelter'', a novel by [[Harlan Coben]] published by Orion in 2011 == Music == === Bands and labels === * [[Shelter (band)]] (since 1991), an American Krishnacore band * [[Shelter Records]] (1969–1981), an American record label === Albums, chronologically {{anchor|Albums}} ===<!--from [[Shelter (album)]]--> * [[Shelter (Lone Justice album)|''Shelter'' (Lone Justice album)]], 1986 * [[Shelter (Brand New Heavies album)|''Shelter'' (Brand New Heavies album)]]'' (featuring Siedah Garrett), 1997 * [[Shelter (Rasa album)|''Shelter'' (Rasa album)]], 2003 album by [[Rasa (band)|Rasa]] * [[Shelter (soundtrack)|''Shelter'' (soundtrack)]], 2008 album from the eponymous 2007 movie === Songs === * [[Shelter (The xx song)|"Shelter" (The xx song)]] * "Shelter", a song by Bedouin Soundclash from ''[[Sounding a Mosaic]]'' * "Shelter", a song by thenewno2 from ''[[You Are Here (Thenewno2 album)|You Are Here]]'' * "Shelter", a song by [[Ray LaMontagne]] * "Shelter", a song by [[Birdy (musician)|Birdy]] == Other uses == * [[Shelter in place]], an emergency-response process * [[Shelter rule]], a doctrine in the common law of property * [[USS Shelter (AM-301)|USS ''Shelter'' (AM-301)]], an American minesweeper ==See also== * [[The Shelter (disambiguation)]] {{Disambiguation}}
